nws.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 4pm. Partly sunny. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 79 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
